00035 
00036 #include "contiki.h"
00037 #include "contiki-net.h"
00038 
00039 #include "dev/rs232.h"
00040 #include "dev/rtl8019-drv.h"
00041 
00042 #include <avr/interrupt.h>
00043 #include <avr/io.h>
00044 #include <avr/pgmspace.h>
00045 
00046 PROCINIT(&etimer_process, &tcpip_process, &rtl8019_process);
00047 
00048 static const struct uip_eth_addr ethaddr = {{0x00,0x06,0x98,0x01,0x02,0x29}};
00049 
00050 int
00051 main(void)
00052 {
00053   uip_ipaddr_t addr;
00054 
00055   /*
00056    * GCC depends on register r1 set to 0.
00057    */
00058   asm volatile ("clr r1");
00059 
00060   /*
00061    * No interrupts used.
00062    */
00063   cli();
00064 
00065   /*
00066    * Enable external data and address
00067    * bus.
00068    */
00069   MCUCR = _BV(SRE) | _BV(SRW);
00070 
00071   clock_init();
00072   rs232_init(RS232_PORT_0, USART_BAUD_57600,USART_PARITY_NONE | USART_STOP_BITS_1 | USART_DATA_BITS_8);
00073 
00074   sei();
00075 
00076 
00077   process_init();
00078 
00079   uip_ipaddr(&addr, 193,10,67,152);
00080   uip_sethostaddr(&addr);
00081 
00082   uip_setethaddr(ethaddr);
00083 
00084   procinit_init();
00085 
00086   autostart_start(autostart_processes);
00087 
00088   rs232_print(RS232_PORT_0, "Initialized\n");
00089 
00090   while(1) {
00091     process_run();
00092   }
00093 
00094   return 0;
00095 }
00096 
00097 int
00098 putchar(int c)
00099 {
00100   rs232_send(RS232_PORT_0, c);
00101   return c;
00102 }
